review: I liked the packaging of this product and the fact that it is voice activated.  I do not have the premium services of Netflix or Amazon Prime.  The only thing I could do with the box was stream Pandora radio.I also liked the screen saver aspect, nice pictures.Just not for me at this time.
author: Hal Starling

review: I ordered this product on a 30 day trial as a Prime Member.  I received it within a couple of days and was excited to get started.  Set up was so easy a child could do it.  I added a Hulu Plus Trial Membership to make this thing fully functional.  I tried out the voice activated remote control which translated my voice perfectly and found the programs I was looking for with great ease and relatively quickly.  I was able to navigate to Hulu Plus and search through those offerings as well.  Everything works well...except -The offerings through Amazon all cost a minimum of $1.99 and higher.  This could be a costly proposition.  Searching using the icons was confusing and not in any particular order - not alphabetical, so it was a laborious process to look through all the offerings that way.  No way I could figure out how to discern FREE programming from priced programming.  Same with Hulu Plus.  Everything I searched for had an additional charge and was not in alphabetical order.  Could not easily find a way to ferret out only free programming.  Could not find a way to search only through Prime membership offerings, which would have given me the free options I get on my p.c.After playing with this for about a week, I decided to return it.  The upcharge required for the TV shows I was looking for was not for me.  Great idea that needs a little more work.  I would consider buying again later if they get those issues worked out.
